title: Mobile-Based Experiential Continuing Education (CE) Effectiveness Enhancement Program for Psychologists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychological theories and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Modular content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments. Discussion boards for teacher-learner interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately connect psychological theories with real-world educational cases by at least 80% through experiential learning modules lasting over one hour.
Learners can develop at least three practical strategies by applying multiple pedagogical approaches (discussion, simulation, case analysis).
Learners can apply at least two pieces of knowledge acquired via mobile platforms to actual classroom settings within two weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
